desc_short: Chance of countering and reducing ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR when receiving a physical attack
受到物理攻擊時一定機率進行反擊+降低攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值
물리공격을 받으면 일정 확률로 반격+공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 감소

Posibilidad de contraataque y de reducir ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP al recibir un ataque físico
desc_long: Adds chance of countering and reducing ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR when receiving a physical attack.
受到物理攻擊時一定機率進行反擊，並降低其攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值。
